lyric:
[00:00.000] 作词 : Elliott-Smith, Larsen ...
[00:59.330]Have you ever noticed
[01:00.990]
[01:03.090]That I'm not acting as I used to do before?
[01:05.900]
[01:06.740]Have you ever wondered
[01:08.090]
[01:10.440]Why I always keep on coming back for more?
[01:13.260]
[01:14.000]What have you done to me?
[01:15.590]
[01:17.730]I'll never be the same, I tell you for sure
[01:20.610]
[01:21.570]I'll never be the same, I tell you for sure
[01:24.080]
[01:24.830]I'll never be the same, I tell you for sure
[01:27.990]
[01:29.810]You really are my ecstasy,
[01:31.470]
[01:37.270]My real life fantasy, oh yeah...
[01:40.170]
[01:44.720]You really are my ecstasy,
[01:46.550]
[01:51.960]My real life fantasy, oh yeah...
[01:55.080]
[02:00.320]Not that I'm complaining,
[02:02.110]
[02:03.740]A more beautiful vision, I have never seen
[02:06.950]
[02:07.560]If you don't mind me saying,
[02:09.100]
[02:11.240]A lifelong ambition to fulfill my dream
[02:14.150]
[02:15.090]What have you done to me?
[02:16.730]
[02:18.570]I'll never be the same, I tell you for sure
[02:21.480]
[02:22.270]I'll never be the same, I tell you for sure
[02:25.020]
[02:25.740]I'll never be the same, I tell you for sure
[02:28.850]
[02:30.810]You really are my ecstasy,
[02:32.560]
[02:38.280]My real life fantasy, oh yeah...
[02:41.290]
[02:45.530]You really are my ecstasy,
[02:47.380]
[02:53.050]My real life fantasy, oh yeah...
[02:55.790]
[03:00.360]You really are my ecstasy,
[03:02.270]
[03:04.970](There can be no other
[03:06.170]While we still have each other)
[03:07.420]My real life fantasy, oh yeah...
[03:10.590]
[03:12.410](There can be no other
[03:13.570]While we still have each other)
[03:14.790]You really are my ecstasy,
[03:16.580]
[03:19.840](There can be no other
[03:21.030]While we still have each other)
[03:22.340]My real life fantasy, oh yeah...
[03:25.440]
[03:26.290](I tell you for sure)
[03:27.600]
tlyric:
[by:dqljgy]
[00:59.330]你是否曾注意过
[01:03.090]我再也不像从前那样
[01:06.740]你是否也曾困惑过
[01:10.440]我为何不停回首
[01:14.000]你对我做了什么
[01:17.730]我从未如此确信地告诉你
[01:21.570]我从未如此确信地告诉你
[01:24.830]我从未如此确信地告诉你
[01:29.810]你让我着迷
[01:37.270]你是我生命之幻想
[01:44.720]你让我沉沦
[01:51.960]你是我真正的生命幻想
[02:00.320]我并非是在抱怨
[02:03.740]我还没来得及领略太多的美好
[02:07.560]如果你不介意我这样说
[02:11.240]我想一生追求去实现我的梦
[02:15.090]你对我做了什么
[02:18.570]我从未如此确信地告诉你
[02:22.270]我从未如此确信地告诉你
[02:25.740]我从未如此确信地告诉你
[02:30.810]你让我着迷
[02:38.280]你是我生命之幻想
[02:45.530]你让我沉沦
[02:53.050]你是我真正的生命幻想
[03:00.360]你让我癫狂
[03:04.970]当我们拥有彼此
[03:06.170]其他的一切将没有意义
[03:07.420]你是我真正的终身所望
[03:12.410]若能拥有彼此
[03:13.570]我愿意放弃一切
[03:14.790]你让我癫狂
[03:19.840]若能拥有彼此
[03:21.030]我愿意放弃一切
[03:22.340]你是我真正的终身所望
[03:26.290]我认真的
